short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Resets the daily limit for pixlr apps, building on ClaytonTDM's original ideas. Enhanced and extended by AletheiaX.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Pixlr Reset Limit

This extension removes the day limit on Pixlr app, allowing users to continue working and saving without interruptions. Please note that this extension is not an official Pixlr product. 

Reset Daily Limit: Quickly remove the daily limit with a single click.
Auto Run: Automatically resets the daily limit every time you reload. (page reload required)
Auto Run Beta: The new and improved Auto Run feature that auto runs WITHOUT page reload.

Notes: 
- This extension was inspired by ClaytonTDM: https://github.com/ClaytonTDM/daily-saves-for-pixlr

Discord:https://discord.gg/rhndcF3GKw
